mapper.update: update AF_USER set OPENID = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDCARD = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EFFSTART = #{effstart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EFFEND = #{effend,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, USERSTATUS = #{userstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where TELNUM = #{telnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select TELNUM, OPENID, PASSWORD, USERNAME, IDCARD, EFFSTART, EFFEND, USERSTATUS, CREATETIME from AF_USER where TELNUM = #{telnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select TELNUM, OPENID, PASSWORD, USERNAME, IDCARD, EFFSTART, EFFEND, USERSTATUS, CREATETIME from AF_USER
select count(*) from AF_USER t where t.effstart <=sysdate and t.effend >= sysdate and t.idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
